snippet: Krysten Ritter, a former Elite model, moves from supporting parts into a lead role in the film “Life Happens” and on ABC’s new sitcom “Don’t Trust the B–––– in Apartment 23.”
abstract: Former model-turned actress Krysten Ritter moves from supporting parts into a lead role in the film L!fe Happens and on ABC’s new sitcom Don’t Trust the B---- in Apartment 23; Ritter brings her trademark moxie to both projects.
lead_paragraph: Krysten Ritter, a former Elite model, moves from supporting parts into a lead role in the film “Life Happens” and on ABC’s new sitcom “Don’t Trust the B–––– in Apartment 23.”

headline.seo: Krysten Ritter Takes the Lead in ‘L!fe Happens’
headline.main: Storming the Catwalk, Then the Screen
